entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 5:07 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 5.3°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a
